name: Fintech to YNAB
description: Automatically push Monzo and Starling transactions into YNAB

SKIP_AUTO_CLEAR.description: By default we mark transactions in your accounts currency as cleared, this allows you to skip that

SKIP_EMOJI.description: By default we include the emoji from Monzo in the YNAB description. This skips that.

SKIP_TAGS.description: By default we include the hash tags from Monzo in the YNAB description. This skips that.

STARLING_YNAB_ACCOUNT.description: Your YNAB account name used by Starling

MONZO_YNAB_ACCOUNT.description: Your YNAB account name used by Monzo
